attachment_text: SecureNet Asia provides 24x7 SOC monitoring with SIEM platforms such as Splunk and QRadar. Services include threat detection, incident response, and monthly security reporting.
This certifies that SecureNet Asia complies with ISO/IEC 27001 information security management standards.
TechNova Solutions specializes in system integration, custom software development, and enterprise cloud migration projects for government and corporate clients.
GreenBuild Engineering completed multiple commercial and infrastructure projects including highways, factories, and office towers.
DataShield Consulting offers cybersecurity risk assessments, ISO27001 compliance audits, and regulatory advisory services across ASEAN.
CloudAxis delivers secure cloud hosting, DevOps automation, and managed security services on AWS and Azure platforms.
Meditech Systems develops hospital information systems, EMR platforms, and healthcare analytics compliant with medical standards.
Quantum Analytics provides advanced data analytics, machine learning models, and AI-driven business intelligence solutions.
InfraSecure Global focuses on operational technology security, protecting critical infrastructure from cyber threats.
